name: Witherhoard
flavor_text: "Like a one-man private security company." —The Drifter

frame.name: Primeval's Torment
frame.description: Projectiles fired by this weapon blight the target or nearby area on impact.

perks.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Countermass

perks.description:
This weapon's explosives are more effective.
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Black Powder

perks.description: Blighted targets take damage over time and blight the nearby area on death.
perks.name: Break the Bank

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
